message.content:
Lorillard Corporation
666 Fifth Avenue
New York
New York 10103
Attn: Mr. Robert Kennedy

PROPOSAL

FOR________Metal "Pack" Plaque
DATE October 16, 1987___
Mr. A. D. Steinberg
YOUR REPRESENTATIVE

It is our pleasure to propose the following:

ITEM:________ Harley Davidson Metal Plaque____________ SIZE:____17½ x 23½"_____
MATERIAL: STEEL__ ALUMINUM_X_ OTHER____ GAUGE .025"_____
BASE COLOR________Aluminum___________________________________
COLORS: Transparent gold, opaque black, white and orange
FACE:____SINGLE FACE_X DOUBLE FACE_____

HOLES: YES_X_ NO___ NUMBER OF___4____
CORNERS: ROUND___ SQUARE___ ANGLE___ CUT TO SHAPE___
EDGES: HEMMED___ CURLED___ EMBOSSED_X BEADED BORDER___
STAMP FRAME_X_ RIGHT ANGLE BEND___ BACK FRAME___

PACKING: PER CARTON___ PER CRATE___ PER BUNDLE___
OTHER: Price is based on reproduction of customer supplied "Pack" box.
Tooling: Form die, brass emboss. die to achieve detail on eagle.

QUANTITIES:____500 Plaques________________________
One time tooling @ $3,015.00_____________
Price:__________$9.18 each_______________________
Steel tips $1,045.00______

BILLING:
BILL AS MANUFACTURE.__ BILL AS SHIP FOR.__ 6 MOS.__ 12 MOS.__
WAREHOUSING: SHIP IMMEDIATELY.__ 6 MOS. WHSE.__ 12 MOS. WHSE.__

DROP SHIPPING:_______PENAL SHIPMENT._______

CONDITIONS:
PRICES QUOTED HEREIN ARE BASED ON CURRENT COSTS AND ARE FOR IMMEDIATE ACCEPTANCE.
These prices will be updated periodically, from date of order, to reflect changes in material and labor costs.
Price and terms quoted herein are not subject to verbal changes unless confirmed in writing by the home office of this company in ST. LOUIS, MO. All
contracts for delivery, are contingent upon fires, strikes or other causes beyond our control.
Purchaser agrees to accept charges which refer to the exercise of right of the quantity quoted.
Any taxes or governmental amount or undersell price may be required to pay or collect upon the production, sale, storage, or delivery, under any existing or
future law shall be for the account of the buyer who shall promptly pay the amount hereof to the seller upon demand.
F.O.B. ST. LOUIS, MISSOURI. Shipments via truck shipped freight collect.
A 15% service charge will be added to freight costs for all prepaid shipments involving 5 or more pieces.

TERMS — NET TO 10 DAYS:
A service charge of 1½% per month will be
applied to all unpaid balances over 30 days.

STOUT
INDUSTRIES, INC.
